Chinese1: 我想告诉你一个好消息。
Translate1: I want to tell you a good news.

Pinyin1: tāmen gěi le nǐ duōshǎo qián ？

Pinyin1: tā sòng le nǚpéngyou hěnduō huā 。

Pinyin1: bàba yào sònggěi wǒ yīgè hěnguì de shēngrilǐwù 。
Chinese1: 爸爸要送给我一个很贵的生日礼物。
Translate1: Dad is going to give me an expensive birthday present.

Pinyin1: nǐ kěyǐ jiè wǒ liǎngqiānkuài qián ma ？
Chinese1: 你可以借我两千块钱吗？
Translate1: Can you lend me two thousand dollars?

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn gāng fāgěi wǒ shànggèyuè de gōngzī 。
Chinese1: 老板刚发给我上个月的工资。
Translate1: My boss just sent me last month's salary.

Pinyin1: zhège rénpiàn le wǒ hěnduō qián 。
Translate1: This man scammed me out of a lot of money.

Pinyin1: nǐmen juéde wǒhuà dé zěnmeyàng ？
Chinese1: 你们觉得我画得怎么样？
Translate1: What do you guys think of my drawing?

Pinyin1: wǒmen juéde nǐ huà dé hěn hǎo 。
Translate1: We think you draw very well.

Pinyin1: tā yīngyǔ shuō dé zěnmeyàng ？
Translate1: How does he speak English?

Pinyin1: tā yīngyǔ shuō dé yībān 。
Translate1: He speaks English fluently.

Pinyin1: nǐ zuò dé bùcuò 。
Translate1: You are doing well.

Pinyin1: háizi men xuédé tǐngkuài de 。

Pinyin1: wǒ chī dé tàibǎo le 。
Translate1: I am too full.

Pinyin1: xiǎogǒu kěài sǐ le 。

Translate1: The teacher said there was no homework today, and we were all overjoyed.

Pinyin1: nǐ kànbudǒng wǒ de yóujiàn ma ？

Pinyin1: tā měinián dōu lái zhōngguó 。

Translate1: I call my mother every week.

Translate1: Every student in this class is very smart.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī měitiān dōu gěi wǒmen hěnduō zuòyè 。

Pinyin1: tāmen měige zhōumò dōu qù gōngyuán 。
Chinese1: 他们每个周末都去公园。

Chinese1: 我是第一个到公司的人。
Translate1: I was the first person to the company.

Pinyin1: tā bùdébù zuò zǎoshang dìyībān dìtiě qù shàngbān 。

Translate1: He had to take the first subway in the morning to go to work.

Translate1: Xiao Li is her third boyfriend.

Pinyin1: bàba de dìyīgè shǒujī shì xiǎomǐ 。

Pinyin1: dào měiguó de dìèrge yuè ， wǒ zhǎodào le gōngzuò 。

Translate1: In the second month in the United States, I found a job.

Pinyin1: lái shànghǎi yǐhòu de dìèrnián ， tākāi le zhèjiā gōngsī 。

Chinese1: 他帮了你，你怎么不说“谢谢”？
Translate1: He helped you, why didn't you say "thank you"?

Pinyin1: nǐ jiéhūn de shíhou zěnme bù gàosu wǒ ？

Translate1: Why didn't you tell me when you got married?

Pinyin1: wǒmen huán méi kāishǐ chī ， tā zěnme yǐjīng chī wán le ？
Chinese1: 我们还没开始吃，他怎么已经吃完了？
Translate1: We haven't started eating yet, why has he finished eating?

Pinyin1: jīntiān shì xīngqīyī ， nǐ zěnme bùqù shàngbān ？
Chinese1: 今天是星期一，你怎么不去上班？
Translate1: Today is Monday, why don't you go to work?

Pinyin1: shuǐ zěnme bùrè ？
Translate1: Why is the water not hot?

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de chuāncài zěnme bùlà ？
Translate1: Why is the Sichuan food here not spicy?

Pinyin1: tāqīn le nǐ ， nǐ zěnme bù gāoxìng ？
Chinese1: 他亲了你，你怎么不高兴？

Translate1: How could she not be sad that her kitten died?

Pinyin1: měitiān gōngzuò shíèrgè xiǎoshí ， nǐ zěnme bù lěi ？

Translate1: Working twelve hours a day, why aren't you tired?

Translate1: Why is he so lazy?

Translate1: A: Today is a holiday, so happy.

Pinyin1: b : bùshì míngtiān fàngjià ma ？
Translate1: B: Isn't tomorrow a holiday?

Pinyin1: a : tā yòu gǎnmào le 。
Translate1: A: He has a cold again.

Pinyin1: b : tā měitiān chuān dé dōu hěnshǎo ， néng bù gǎnmào ma ？
Chinese1: B:他每天穿得都很少，能不感冒吗？
Translate1: B: He wears very little every day. Can he not catch a cold?

Pinyin1: a : jīntiān wǒ kěnéng huì chídào 。
Translate1: A: I might be late today.

Pinyin1: b : nǐ qǐ dé zhèmewǎn ， néng bù chídào ma ？
Chinese1: B:你起得这么晚，能不迟到吗？
Translate1: B: You got up so late, can you not be late?

Pinyin1: a : wǒdiǎn le hěnduō cài ， dōu shì nǐ ài chī de 。
Chinese1: A:我点了很多菜，都是你爱吃的。
Translate1: A: I ordered a lot of dishes, all of which you like.

Pinyin1: b : wǎnshàng chī zhème duōcài ， néng bù pàng ma ？
Chinese1: B:晚上吃这么多菜，能不胖吗？
Translate1: B: Can you not get fat if you eat so many dishes at night?

Pinyin1: a : tāmen gōngsī hěn lìhai 。
Translate1: A: Their company is very powerful.

Pinyin1: b : dànshì tāmen gōngsī zěnme huì yǒu zhème bèn de yuángōng ？
Chinese1: B:但是他们公司怎么会有这么笨的员工？
Translate1: B: But how can their company have such stupid employees?

Pinyin1: a : wǒ shōudào le nǐ de yóujiàn 。
Translate1: A: I have received your email.

Pinyin1: b : nà nǐ zěnme huì bù zhīdào ？
Translate1: B: Then how come you don't know?

Pinyin1: a : wǒ gǎnjué zuìjìn yǒu yīdiǎn pàng le 。
Chinese1: A:我感觉最近有一点胖了。
Translate1: A: I feel a little fat recently.

Pinyin1: b : shéi ràng nǐ chī zhème duō ？
Translate1: B: Who told you to eat so much?

Pinyin1: a : wǒ zhǎo bùdào wǒ de yàoshi le 。
Translate1: A: I can't find my key.

Pinyin1: b : shéi ràng nǐ bù fàngzài bāo lǐ 。
Translate1: B: Who told you not to put it in the bag.

Pinyin1: nǐ huì shuō zhōngwén ， duì bù duì ？
Translate1: You can speak Chinese, right?

Pinyin1: tā shì nǐ de lǎobǎn ， duì bù duì ？
Translate1: He's your boss, right?

Pinyin1: wǒmen shì hǎo péngyou ， duì bù duì ？
Translate1: We are good friends, right?

Pinyin1: nǐ zuótiān méi huíjiā ， duì bù duì ？
Translate1: You didn't come home yesterday, did you?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǒu xīn nǚpéngyou le ， shìbùshì ？
Chinese1: 你有新女朋友了，是不是？
Translate1: You have a new girlfriend, don't you?

Pinyin1: jiǔdiǎn kāihuì ， shìbùshì ？
Translate1: The meeting is at nine, isn't it?

Pinyin1: nǐ xìng wáng ， shìbùshì ？
Translate1: Your surname is Wang, isn't it?

Pinyin1: wǒmen huíjiābā ， hǎobuhǎo ？
Translate1: let's go home, shall we?

Pinyin1: zhōumò qù kàn diànyǐng ， hǎobuhǎo ？
Translate1: Go to the movies this weekend, okay?

Pinyin1: nǐmen míngtiān lái ， hǎobuhǎo ？
Translate1: You guys come tomorrow, okay?

Pinyin1: zhèyàng zuò ， duì ma ？
Translate1: is it right to do so?

Pinyin1: nǐmen jiànguò ， duì ma ？
Translate1: You've seen it, haven't you?

Pinyin1: tāmen zuótiān dōu méi qù ， shì ma ？
Translate1: They didn't go yesterday, did they?

Pinyin1: nǐ méilái guò ， shì ma ？
Translate1: You haven't been here, have you?

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan wǒ mèimei ， shì ma ？
Translate1: You like my sister, don't you?

Pinyin1: wǒmen qù nǐjiā ， hǎo ma ？
Translate1: Let's go to your house, shall we?

Pinyin1: bùyào gàosu tā ， hǎo ma ？
Translate1: Don't tell him, okay?

Pinyin1: jīntiān wǒmen dōu bù hējiǔ ， hǎo ma ？
Chinese1: 今天我们都不喝酒，好吗？
Translate1: Let's not drink today, okay?

Pinyin1: wǒ xiànzài xiǎng qù xǐshǒujiān ， kěyǐ ma ？
Chinese1: 我现在想去洗手间，可以吗？
Translate1: I want to go to the bathroom now, is that ok?

Pinyin1: māma ， wǒyào chī qiǎokèlì ， kěyǐ ma ？
Chinese1: 妈妈，我要吃巧克力，可以吗？
Translate1: Mom, I want to eat chocolate, can I?

Pinyin1: tāxuédé hěnkuài ， yīnwèi tā hěn cōngming 。
Chinese1: 他学得很快，因为他很聪明。
Translate1: He learns quickly because he is very smart.

Pinyin1: wǒ ài chī sìchuāncài ， yīnwèi hěnlà 。
Chinese1: 我爱吃四川菜，因为很辣。
Translate1: I love Sichuan food because it is very spicy.

Pinyin1: wǒ zài xuéxí zhōngwén ， yīnwèi wǒ xiǎng qù zhōngguó 。
Chinese1: 我在学习中文，因为我想去中国。
Translate1: I am learning Chinese because I want to go to China.

Pinyin1: wǒ bù xǐhuan tā ， yīnwèi tā bù yǒuhǎo 。
Chinese1: 我不喜欢她，因为她不友好。
Translate1: I don't like her because she is not friendly.

Pinyin1: jīntiān wǒmen hěn máng ， yīnwèi yǒu hěnduō gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 今天我们很忙，因为有很多工作。
Translate1: We are very busy today because there is a lot of work.

Pinyin1: tā hěnpiāoliàng ， suǒyǐ hěnduō nánhái xǐhuan tā 。
Chinese1: 她很漂亮，所以很多男孩喜欢她。
Translate1: She is very beautiful, so many boys like her.

Pinyin1: tā zhǎodào gōngzuò le ， suǒyǐ hěn gāoxìng 。
Chinese1: 他找到工作了，所以很高兴。
Translate1: He got a job, so he's happy.

Pinyin1: wǒtàimáng le ， suǒyǐ méiyǒu shíjiān gěi nǐ dǎdiànhuà 。
Chinese1: 我太忙了，所以没有时间给你打电话。
Translate1: I'm too busy to call you.

Pinyin1: wǒmen gōngsī yǒu hěnduō wàiguórén ， suǒyǐ wǒmen yàoshuō yīngwén 。
Chinese1: 我们公司有很多外国人，所以我们要说英文。
Translate1: There are many foreigners in our company, so we have to speak English.

Pinyin1: yīnwèi wǒ yǒu yīgè zhōngguó nǚpéngyou ， suǒyǐ wǒ yàoxué zhōngwén 。
Chinese1: 因为我有一个中国女朋友，所以我要学中文。
Translate1: Because I have a Chinese girlfriend, so I have to learn Chinese.

Pinyin1: yīnwèi tā shēngbìng le ， suǒyǐ méi qù shàngkè 。
Chinese1: 因为他生病了，所以没去上课。
Translate1: Because he was sick, he didn't go to class.

Pinyin1: yīnwèi wǒ hěn lěi ， suǒyǐ yào xiūxi 。
Chinese1: 因为我很累，所以要休息。
Translate1: Because I'm tired, I need to rest.

Pinyin1: yīnwèi tàiyuǎn le ， suǒyǐ wǒ bùxiǎng qù 。
Chinese1: 因为太远了，所以我不想去。
Translate1: I don't want to go because it's too far away.

Pinyin1: yīnwèi tàimáng ， suǒyǐ wǒmen méiyǒu shíjiān chī zhōngfàn 。
Chinese1: 因为太忙，所以我们没有时间吃中饭。
Translate1: Because we are too busy, we don't have time to have lunch.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kuàidào le 。
Translate1: We are almost there.

Pinyin1: kuài xiàyǔ le 。
Translate1: It's going to rain.

Pinyin1: kuàiyào guònián le ， nǐ shénme shíhou huíjiā ？
Chinese1: 快要过年了，你什么时候回家？
Translate1: Chinese New Year is coming soon, when will you go home?

Pinyin1: wǒ nǚpéngyou kuàiyào guòshēngrì le 。
Chinese1: 我女朋友快要过生日了。
Translate1: My girlfriend's birthday is coming up.

Pinyin1: kuài xiàchē le ， nǐ zài děng yīhuìr 。
Chinese1: 快下车了，你再等一会儿。
Translate1: Get out of the car soon, you wait a little longer.

Pinyin1: tiānkuài hēi le 。
Translate1: it's getting dark.

Pinyin1: wǒ kuàihǎole 。
Translate1: I'm almost ready.

Pinyin1: fànkuài liáng le 。
Translate1: The rice is getting cold.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē zàng yīfú kuài chòu le 。
Translate1: These dirty clothes are about to stink.

Pinyin1: bùnéng zài hē le ， wǒ kuài zuì le 。
Translate1: Can't drink any more, I'm getting drunk.

Pinyin1: wǒyào shēngqì le ！
Translate1: I'm going to be angry!

Pinyin1: tāmen de háizi yào chūshēng le 。
Translate1: Their child is about to be born.

Pinyin1: jiǔ diǎn le ， chāoshì yào guānmén le 。
Translate1: It's 9 o'clock, and the supermarket is about to close.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuìhǎo de péngyou yào jiéhūn le ！
Chinese1: 我最好的朋友要结婚了！
Translate1: My best friend is getting married!

Pinyin1: shèngdànjié yào dào le ， nǐ yǒu shénme dǎsuàn ？
Chinese1: 圣诞节要到了，你有什么打算？
Translate1: Christmas is coming, what are your plans?

Pinyin1: wǒ juéde zhèlǐ de cài shénme dōu hàochī 。
Chinese1: 我觉得这里的菜什么都好吃。
Translate1: I think everything here is delicious.

Pinyin1: zhōngguó de lìshǐ bàba shénme dōu zhīdào 。
Chinese1: 中国的历史爸爸什么都知道。
Translate1: Chinese history daddy knows everything.

Pinyin1: gōngzuò de shìqing lǎogong shénme dōu gēn wǒ shuō 。
Chinese1: 工作的事情老公什么都跟我说。
Translate1: My husband tells me everything about work.

Pinyin1: māma zuò de cài wǒ shénme dōu xǐhuan 。
Chinese1: 妈妈做的菜我什么都喜欢。
Translate1: I like everything my mother cooks.

Pinyin1: wǒ nǚpéngyou juéde wàiguó de dōngxi shénme dōu hǎo 。
Chinese1: 我女朋友觉得外国的东西什么都好。
Translate1: My girlfriend thinks everything from foreign countries is good.

Pinyin1: wǒmen shénme guǒzhī dōu hē 。
Translate1: We drink any kind of juice.

Pinyin1: tā shénme yīfú dōu shì hēisè de 。
Chinese1: 她什么衣服都是黑色的。
Translate1: Everything she wears is black.

Pinyin1: māma zuò de shénme cài dōu hàochī 。
Chinese1: 妈妈做的什么菜都好吃。
Translate1: Everything my mother cooks is delicious.

Pinyin1: wǒ nánpéngyou shénme yùndòng dōu xǐhuan 。
Chinese1: 我男朋友什么运动都喜欢。
Translate1: My boyfriend likes all kinds of sports.

Pinyin1: nǐ bù yīnggāi shénme huà dōu gēn tā shuō 。
Chinese1: 你不应该什么话都跟他说。
Translate1: You shouldn't tell him everything.

Pinyin1: shēngbìng yǐhòu ， tā shénme jiǔdū bùnéng hē le 。
Chinese1: 生病以后，他什么酒都不能喝了。
Translate1: After he got sick, he couldn't drink any alcohol.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn xiànzài hěn shēngqì ， shénme rén yě bùjiàn 。
Chinese1: 老板现在很生气，什么人也不见。
Translate1: The boss is very angry now and sees no one.

Pinyin1: jīntiān wǒ bù shūfu ， shénme dōngxi dōu méi chī 。
Chinese1: 今天我不舒服，什么东西都没吃。
Translate1: I'm not feeling well today and I haven't eaten anything.

Pinyin1: zuótiān kāihuì de shíhou ， tā shénme huà yě méi shuō 。
Chinese1: 昨天开会的时候，她什么话也没说。
Translate1: During the meeting yesterday, she didn't say anything.

Pinyin1: nǐ zài jiālǐ zěnme shénme shì dōu bù zuò ？
Chinese1: 你在家里怎么什么事都不做？
Translate1: Why are you doing nothing at home?

Pinyin1: biéshuō le ， wǒ bùxiǎng tīng 。
Translate1: Stop talking, I don't want to hear it.

Pinyin1: biéwèn le ， wǒ bùxiǎng shuō 。
Translate1: Don't ask, I don't want to talk.

Pinyin1: bié zuò le ， míngtiān zuò bā 。
Translate1: Don't do it, do it tomorrow.

Pinyin1: biékàn le ， shuìjiào ！
Translate1: Stop watching and sleep!

Pinyin1: biékū le ！
Translate1: do not Cry!

Pinyin1: biéxiào le ， biéren dōu zài kàn nǐ 。
Translate1: Stop laughing, everyone is watching you.

Pinyin1: bié chī le ， wǒmen yào chídào le 。
Translate1: Stop eating, we're going to be late.

Pinyin1: biéwán le ， qù xiě zuòyè 。
Translate1: Stop playing and go do your homework.

Pinyin1: biéhēle ， nǐ yǐjīng zuì le 。
Translate1: Stop drinking, you're already drunk.

Pinyin1: biémǎi le ， tàiguì le ！
Translate1: Don't buy it, it's too expensive!

Pinyin1: bié zuòfàn le ， chūqù chī bā 。
Translate1: Stop cooking and go out to eat.

Pinyin1: xiàyǔ le ， biéchūqù le 。
Translate1: It's raining, don't go out.

Pinyin1: wǒ shì lái wán de 。
Translate1: I'm here to play.

Pinyin1: wǒmen dū zài chūchāi 。
Translate1: We are all on business trips.

Pinyin1: tāmen dōu shì lái shíxí de 。
Translate1: They are all here for internship.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhēnde shì lái bāng wǒmen de ma ？
Chinese1: 你真的是来帮我们的吗？
Translate1: Are you really here to help us?

Pinyin1: wǒmen bùshì qù wán de ， shì qù zuò diàochá de 。
Chinese1: 我们不是去玩的，是去做调查的。
Translate1: We are not here to play, but to investigate.

Pinyin1: zhèzhǒng cài shì yònglái zuò tāng de 。
Translate1: This dish is used to make soup.

Pinyin1: zhège fángjiān shì gěi kèrén zhù de 。
Chinese1: 这个房间是给客人住的。
Translate1: This room is for guests.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē qián shì gěi háizi shàng dàxué de 。
Chinese1: 这些钱是给孩子上大学的。
Translate1: The money is for the kids to go to college.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē lǐwù shì gěi kèhù zhǔnbèi de 。
Chinese1: 这些礼物是给客户准备的。
Translate1: These gifts are for customers.

Pinyin1: qián shì yònglái huā de ， bùshì yònglái shěng de 。
Chinese1: 钱是用来花的，不是用来省的。
Translate1: Money is spent, not saved.

Pinyin1: a : nǐ yě shì dàxuéshēng ？
Translate1: A: Are you a college student too?

Pinyin1: b : wǒ shì zhōngwén zhuānyè de 。
Translate1: B: I major in Chinese.

Pinyin1: zhège píngguǒ shì huài de 。
Translate1: This apple is bad.

Pinyin1: a : nǐ shì shénme shíhou kāishǐ xué zhōngwén de ？
Chinese1: A:你是什么时候开始学中文的？
Translate1: A: When did you start learning Chinese?

Pinyin1: b : wǒ shì liǎngnián qián kāishǐ xué zhōngwén de 。
Chinese1: B:我是两年前开始学中文的。
Translate1: B: I started learning Chinese two years ago.

Pinyin1: a : nǐ shì zài nǎlǐ xué de zhōngwén ？
Translate1: A: Where did you learn Chinese?

Pinyin1: b : wǒ shì zài shànghǎi xué de zhōngwén 。
Translate1: B: I learned Chinese in Shanghai.

Pinyin1: a : zuótiān nǐ shì zěnme huí de jiā ？
Translate1: A: How did you get home yesterday?

Pinyin1: b : zuótiān wǒ shì dǎchē huíjiā de 。
Translate1: B: I took a taxi home yesterday.

Pinyin1: a : wǒ shì jiào hànyǔ de 。
Translate1: A: I teach Chinese.

Pinyin1: b : wǒ shì sòng wàimài de 。
Translate1: B: I'm delivering food.

Pinyin1: wǒ shì lái shíxí de 。
Translate1: I'm here for an internship.

Pinyin1: nǐ cuò le ， nàgè rén shì nǚ de 。
Translate1: You are wrong, that person is a woman.

Pinyin1: tājiā de jiājù dōu shì zhōngshì de 。
Chinese1: 他家的家具都是中式的。
Translate1: The furniture in his house is all Chinese style.

Pinyin1: tā píngshí hěn jiéshěng qián 。
Translate1: He usually saves money.

Pinyin1: zhège dōngxi shì kěyǐ chī de 。
Translate1: This thing is edible.

Pinyin1: wǒhuì qù de 。
Translate1: I'll be there.

Pinyin1: wǒmen néng zuòdào de 。
Translate1: We can do it.

Pinyin1: tā měicì lái wǒjiā dōu dàihuā 。
Translate1: She brings flowers every time she comes to my house.

Pinyin1: wèishénme měicì wǒlái tā dōu bù zài ？
Chinese1: 为什么每次我来他都不在？
Translate1: Why is he not there every time I come?

Pinyin1: wǒ měicì wán zhège yóuxì dōu shū 。
Chinese1: 我每次玩这个游戏都输。
Translate1: I lose every time I play this game.

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme měicì chīhuǒguō dōu lādùzi ？
Chinese1: 你怎么每次吃火锅都拉肚子？
Translate1: Why do you have diarrhea every time you eat hot pot?

Pinyin1: tā měicì chídào dōu shuō yīnwèi dǔchē 。
Chinese1: 他每次迟到都说因为堵车。
Translate1: Every time he was late, he said it was because of a traffic jam.

Pinyin1: wǒ měicì jīngguò zhèjiā diàn dōu huì jìnqù kànkan 。
Chinese1: 我每次经过这家店都会进去看看。
Translate1: Every time I pass by this store, I go in and check it out.

Pinyin1: wǒ mèimei měicì dǎzhēn dōu kū 。
Translate1: My sister cries every time she gets an injection.

Pinyin1: měicì yùdào shēngcí tā dōu yào cházìdiǎn 。
Chinese1: 每次遇到生词他都要查字典。
Translate1: Every time he encounters a new word, he has to look it up in the dictionary.

Pinyin1: měicì biānjí dōu yào bǎocún 。
Translate1: Save every edit.

Pinyin1: bàba měicì chūchāi dōu gěi wǒ mǎi lǐwù 。
Chinese1: 爸爸每次出差都给我买礼物。
Translate1: Dad buys me presents every time he goes on a business trip.

Pinyin1: pīnyīn bǐ hànzì róngyì hěnduō 。
Translate1: Pinyin is much easier than Chinese characters.

Pinyin1: zuò gāotiě bǐ zuòfēijī fāngbiàn hěnduō 。
Chinese1: 坐高铁比坐飞机方便很多。
Translate1: Taking the high-speed rail is much more convenient than flying.

Pinyin1: zhège nǚlǎoshī bǐ nàgè nán lǎoshī yángé dé duō 。
Chinese1: 这个女老师比那个男老师严格得多。
Translate1: This female teacher is much stricter than that male teacher.

Pinyin1: wǒ lǎopó de gōngzī bǐ wǒ gāodé duō 。
Chinese1: 我老婆的工资比我高得多。
Translate1: My wife's salary is much higher than mine.

Pinyin1: nǐ bǐ wǒ yǒu jīngyàn duō le 。
Translate1: You have more experience than me.

Pinyin1: nǐmen bǐ wǒmen xìngyùn duō le 。
Translate1: You are much luckier than us.

Pinyin1: tā dǎlánqiú bǐ wǒ lìhai duō le 。
Chinese1: 他打篮球比我厉害多了。
Translate1: He is much better at basketball than me.

Pinyin1: wǒ de gǎnmào hǎoduō le 。
Translate1: My cold is much better.

Pinyin1: zuìjìn tiānqì nuǎnhuo duō le 。
Translate1: The weather has been much warmer lately.

Pinyin1: shàng dàxué yǐhòu ， tā chéngshú duō le 。
Chinese1: 上大学以后，她成熟多了。
Translate1: After going to college, she has matured a lot.

Pinyin1: suīrán wàimiàn hěn lěng ， kěshì lǐmiàn hěn nuǎnhuo 。
Chinese1: 虽然外面很冷，可是里面很暖和。
Translate1: Although it is cold outside, it is warm inside.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú suīrán yǒudiǎn guì ， dànshì zhìliàng hěn hǎo 。
Chinese1: 这件衣服虽然有点贵，但是质量很好。
Translate1: The dress is a bit pricey, but the quality is good.

Pinyin1: tā suīrán bùxiǎng qù ， dànshì háishi qù le 。
Chinese1: 他虽然不想去，但是还是去了。
Translate1: Although he didn't want to go, he went anyway.

Pinyin1: suīrán tājiā hěn yǒuqián ， kěshì tā cóngláibù làngfèi qián 。
Chinese1: 虽然他家很有钱，可是他从来不浪费钱。
Translate1: Although his family is rich, he never wastes money.

Pinyin1: wǒ mèimei suīrán hěnpàng ， kěshì hěn línghuó 。
Chinese1: 我妹妹虽然很胖，可是很灵活。
Translate1: Although my sister is fat, she is very flexible.

Pinyin1: suīrán tā zhǔnbèi dé hěn hǎo ， dànshì háishi yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng 。
Chinese1: 虽然她准备得很好，但是还是有点紧张。
Translate1: Although she was well prepared, she was still a little nervous.

Pinyin1: nǐ suīrán xuélì gāo ， kěshì méiyǒu gōngzuò jīngyàn 。
Chinese1: 你虽然学历高，可是没有工作经验。
Translate1: Although you have a high degree of education, you have no work experience.

Pinyin1: nǎinai suīrán bāshíduōsuì le ， dànshì tā jīngshén hěn hǎo 。
Chinese1: 奶奶虽然八十多岁了，但是她精神很好。
Translate1: Although grandma is over eighty years old, she is in good spirits.

Pinyin1: suīrán nǐmen méiyǒu yíng ， dànshì wǒ zhīdào dàjiā jìnlì le 。
Chinese1: 虽然你们没有赢，但是我知道大家尽力了。
Translate1: Although you didn't win, I know you all tried your best.

Pinyin1: suīrán wǒ rènshi tā hěn chángshíjiān le ， dànshì wǒ háishi bù liǎojiě tā 。
Chinese1: 虽然我认识他很长时间了，但是我还是不了解他。
Translate1: Although I have known him for a long time, I still do not understand him.

Pinyin1: nǐ yě yào chá ma ？
Translate1: Do you want tea too?

Pinyin1: wǒmen dōu yào kāfēi 。
Translate1: We all want coffee.

Pinyin1: dàjiā yào bùyào mǐfàn ？
Translate1: Do you want some rice?

Pinyin1: nǐmen yào bīngshuǐ háishi rèshuǐ ？
Translate1: Do you want ice water or hot water?

Pinyin1: xièxie ， wǒ shénme dōu bùyào 。
Translate1: Thanks, I don't want anything.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng nǐ 。
Translate1: I miss you.

Pinyin1: wǒ yǒudiǎn xiǎng wǒ de jiārén 。
Translate1: I kind of miss my family.

Pinyin1: nǐmen huí měiguó yǐhòu ， huìxiǎng zhōngguó cài ma ？
Chinese1: 你们回美国以后，会想中国菜吗？
Translate1: When you return to the US, will you miss Chinese food?

Pinyin1: nǐ nǚpéngyou bù zài de shíhou ， nǐ huì xiǎng tā ma ？
Chinese1: 你女朋友不在的时候，你会想她吗？
Translate1: When your girlfriend is away, do you miss her?

Pinyin1: māma dǎdiànhuà de shíhou gēn wǒ shuō ， tā hěn xiǎng wǒ 。
Chinese1: 妈妈打电话的时候跟我说，她很想我。
Translate1: When my mother called me, she told me that she missed me very much.

Pinyin1: wǒyào xiūxi 。
Translate1: I want to rest.

Pinyin1: nǐ yě yào huíjiā ma ？
Translate1: Are you going home too?

Pinyin1: nǐmen yào hē shénme ？
Translate1: What do you want to drink?

Pinyin1: wǒyào bāng lǎobǎn zuò wán zhèxiē gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 我要帮老板做完这些工作。
Translate1: I'm going to help my boss with these tasks.

Pinyin1: dàjiā wǎnshàng yào bùyào chūqù chī ？
Chinese1: 大家晚上要不要出去吃？
Translate1: Do you want to go out to eat tonight?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng qù ma ？
Translate1: do you want to go?

Pinyin1: wǒ bùxiǎng jiàn tā 。
Translate1: I don't want to see her.

Pinyin1: zhōumò nǐmen xiǎng kàn diànyǐng ma ？
Translate1: Do you want to watch a movie this weekend?

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng qǐng nǐ chīfàn 。
Translate1: I want to treat you to dinner.

Pinyin1: tāmen chūnjié bùxiǎng huíjiā ma ？
Translate1: Don't they want to go home for the Spring Festival?

Pinyin1: xīngqīliù wǒyào qù běijīng 。
Translate1: I'm going to Beijing on Saturday.

Pinyin1: xiàgèyuè tā yào zhǎo xīn gōngzuò 。
Translate1: She will be looking for a new job next month.

Pinyin1: zhège zhōumò nǐmen yào chūqùwán ma ？
Chinese1: 这个周末你们要出去玩吗？
Translate1: Are you going to hang out this weekend?

Pinyin1: jiéhūn yǐhòu ， nǐ yào gēn fùmǔ zhùzàiyīqǐ ma ？
Chinese1: 结婚以后，你要跟父母住在一起吗？
Translate1: After marriage, will you live with your parents?

Pinyin1: shēngwán háizi yǐhòu ， nǐ tàitai yào huíqu gōngzuò ma ？
Chinese1: 生完孩子以后，你太太要回去工作吗？
Translate1: Will your wife go back to work after giving birth?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎngyào jǐge háizi ？
Translate1: How many children do you want?

Pinyin1: wǒ lǎopó zǒngshì xiǎngyào zuìguì de bāo 。
Chinese1: 我老婆总是想要最贵的包。
Translate1: My wife always wants the most expensive bag.

Pinyin1: tā xiǎngyào zhǎo yīgè yǒuqián de nánpéngyou 。
Chinese1: 她想要找一个有钱的男朋友。
Translate1: She wants to find a rich boyfriend.

Pinyin1: nǐmen wèishénme xiǎngyào líkāi běijīng ？
Chinese1: 你们为什么想要离开北京？
Translate1: Why do you want to leave Beijing?

Pinyin1: tā xiǎngyào bāng nǐ zhǎo yīgè gēnghǎo de gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 他想要帮你找一个更好的工作。
Translate1: He wants to help you find a better job.

Pinyin1: wǒmen dōu huì yóuyǒng 。
Translate1: We can all swim.

Pinyin1: tā bùhuì xiū diànnǎo 。
Translate1: He can't fix computers.

Pinyin1: a : nǐ huì shuō zhōngwén ma ？
Translate1: A: Can you speak Chinese?

Pinyin1: b : bùhǎoyìsi ， wǒ zhǐhuì shuō yīdiǎn 。
Chinese1: B:不好意思，我只会说一点。
Translate1: B: Sorry, I can only say a little bit.

Pinyin1: a : nǐ néng chī sānwǎn mǐfàn ma ？
Translate1: A: Can you have three bowls of rice?

Pinyin1: b : bùnéng 。
Translate1: B: Can't.

Pinyin1: a : lǎoshī ， wǒ kěyǐ zǎodiǎn zǒu ma ？
Translate1: A: Teacher, can I leave early?

Pinyin1: b : bù kěyǐ 。
Translate1: B: No.

Pinyin1: a : wǒnéng zài zhèlǐ chōuyān ma ？
Translate1: A: Can I smoke here?

Pinyin1: b : bùnéng 。
Translate1: B: Can't.

Pinyin1: a : wàiguórén néng bùnéng cānjiā ？
Translate1: A: Can foreigners participate?

Pinyin1: b : bùnéng 。
Translate1: B: Can't.

Pinyin1: a : jīntiān huì xiàyǔ ma ？
Translate1: A: Will it rain today?

Pinyin1: b : wǒ kàn bùhuì 。
Translate1: B: I don't think so.

Pinyin1: míngtiān nǐ néng zǎodiǎn lái ma ？
Translate1: Can you come early tomorrow?

Pinyin1: kěbùkěyǐ huàn shíjiān ？
Translate1: Can we change the time?

Pinyin1: tā bùhuì gēn nǐ jiéhūn 。
Translate1: He will not marry you.

Pinyin1: nǐhuìshēng wǒ de qì ma ？
Translate1: will you be mad at me

Pinyin1: zhèyàng chuānhuì hǎokàn ma ？
Translate1: Will it look good in this way?

Pinyin1: tā hěn néng shuō 。
Translate1: He can speak very well.

Pinyin1: wǒ māma hěnhuì zuòfàn 。
Translate1: My mother is good at cooking.

Pinyin1: tā cái wǔsuì ， dànshì hěnhuì shuōhuà 。
Chinese1: 她才五岁，但是很会说话。
Translate1: She is only five years old, but she can talk very well.

Pinyin1: zhège nǚshēng hěnhuì dǎbàn 。
Translate1: This girl is very good at dressing up.

Pinyin1: tātàinéng shuì le 。
Translate1: He is too sleepy.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhēnnéng chī !
Translate1: you eat so much

Pinyin1: zhōngguó rénzhēnhuì chī !
Translate1: Chinese people really know how to eat!

Pinyin1: méixiǎngdào nǐ zhème néng chīkǔ 。
Translate1: I didn't expect you to be so hard-working.

Pinyin1: wǒ de jiǎo hǎo le ， xiànzài yòu néng tiàowǔ le 。
Chinese1: 我的脚好了，现在又能跳舞了。
Translate1: My feet are healed and I can dance again now.

Pinyin1: wǒ hěn xǐhuan tiàowǔ 。
Translate1: I love dancing.

Pinyin1: nǐ míngtiān yào qù nǎlǐ miànshì ？
Translate1: Where are you going to interview tomorrow?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào zhètiáo jiē nǎlǐ de dōngxi zuì hàochī ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道这条街哪里的东西最好吃吗？
Translate1: Do you know where the food on this street is the best?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào wǒ zuì xǐhuan chī shénme ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道我最喜欢吃什么吗？
Translate1: Do you know what my favorite food is?
